# gui2html
##### This is a package that turns GUI into HTML
> # install
>> ```shell
>>pip install gui2html
>>```
> # use
>>```python
>>from gui2html import *
>>Label(text='hello',_class='class',id='id',stylesheet='color: red;')
>>create()
>>```
> # Updata Info
>> ##### 2022.1.24 0.0.1
>>> updata Label class
>>
>
